leads.lead_text: Branchlets with furrows usually glabrous; ribs rounded; south-west corner of Victoria
Branchlets with furrows obviously pubescent at least when young; ribs flat or only slightly rounded; Grampians northward
Branchlets with furrows pubescent only when young; ribs nearly flat to slightly rounded; Little Desert to Wyperfeld National Park
Branchlets with furrows pubescent, often strongly so; ribs slightly rounded; Grampians
